metachat.pp.LRC_filtered

metachat.pp.LRC_filtered(adata, LRC_name=None, LRC_cluster=None, copy=False)[source]

Function for assigning LRC points after locak density clustering.

Parameters:

  • adata (AnnData) – The data matrix with shape n_obs × n_var, provided as an anndata object. Rows correspond to cells or spots and columns to genes.

  • LRC_name (Optional[str]) – The name of all possible long-range channel, provided as a string, such as “Blood” or “CSF” (cerebrospinal fluid).

  • LRC_cluster – The output of mc.pp.LRC_cluster funciton

  • copy (bool) – Whether to return a copy of the anndata.AnnData.

Returns:

adata – The points which belongs to LRC are added to .obs['LRC_' + LRC_name + '_filtered'], with non-“0” indicating the cluster of LRC and “0” indicating not a LRC. If copy=True, return the AnnData object and return None otherwise.

Return type:

anndata.AnnData
